BIOGRAFIA.Spider-Man: A young man with arachnid abilities who fights crime in New York.
BIOGRAFIA.Iron Man: A billionaire genius who uses advanced armor to fight evil.
BIOGRAFIA.Thor: The god of thunder from Asgard who protects Earth with his powerful hammer Mjolnir.
BIOGRAFIA.Captain America: A super soldier who fights for justice and freedom during World War II.
BIOGRAFIA.Hulk: A scientist who transforms into a powerful green giant when enraged.
BIOGRAFIA.Black Widow: A spy and martial arts expert who works for S.H.I.E.L.D.
BIOGRAFIA.Hawkeye: An exceptionally skilled archer and member of the Avengers.
BIOGRAFIA.Doctor Strange: A former neurosurgeon who becomes the Sorcerer Supreme, protecting Earth from mystical threats.
BIOGRAFIA.Black Panther: The king of Wakanda who possesses superhuman abilities thanks to the heart-shaped herb.
BIOGRAFIA.Captain Marvel: An Air Force pilot who gains cosmic powers and becomes an intergalactic heroine.
BIOGRAFIA.Loki: The god of lies and deception, adopted brother of Thor.
BIOGRAFIA.Thanos: A mad titan obsessed with universal balance, known for collecting the Infinity Stones.
BIOGRAFIA.Green Goblin: A mad businessman and archenemy of Spider-Man.
BIOGRAFIA.Doctor Octopus: A scientist with mechanical arms who becomes an enemy of Spider-Man.
BIOGRAFIA.Magneto: A mutant with the ability to control magnetism and leader of the Brotherhood of Mutants.
BIOGRAFIA.Red Skull: A Nazi leader and archenemy of Captain America.
BIOGRAFIA.Ultron: An evil artificial intelligence created by Tony Stark that seeks humanity's destruction.
BIOGRAFIA.Kingpin: A powerful criminal and archenemy of Daredevil.
BIOGRAFIA.Mistério: A master of illusions and enemy of Spider-Man.
BIOGRAFIA.Superman: An alien from the planet Krypton with superpowers who protects Earth.
BIOGRAFIA.Batman: A masked vigilante who fights crime in Gotham City.
BIOGRAFIA.Wonder Woman: An Amazonian princess with superhuman strength and exceptional combat skills.
BIOGRAFIA.The Flash: A speedster with the ability to move at incredible velocities.
BIOGRAFIA.Aquaman: The king of Atlantis with the ability to communicate with marine life.
BIOGRAFIA.Green Lantern: A member of the Green Lantern Corps who uses a power ring to create green energy constructs.
BIOGRAFIA.Shazam: A young boy who transforms into an adult superhero with magical powers by saying 'Shazam'.
BIOGRAFIA.Green Arrow: An expert archer and vigilante who fights crime in Star City.
BIOGRAFIA.Joker: A psychopathic criminal and archenemy of Batman.
BIOGRAFIA.Darkseid: A tyrant god from Apokolips who seeks to conquer the universe.
BIOGRAFIA.Harley Quinn: A former psychiatrist who becomes the Joker's companion and a chaotic villain.
BIOGRAFIA.Deathstroke: A mercenary and expert assassin with superhuman abilities.
BIOGRAFIA.Brainiac: An alien artificial intelligence that seeks knowledge and world destruction.
BIOGRAFIA.Sinestro: A former Green Lantern who becomes a villain and leader of the Sinestro Corps.
BIOGRAFIA.Black Manta: An enemy of Aquaman with an advanced suit that allows him to breathe underwater and fight the hero.
BIOGRAFIA.Two-Face: A former district attorney who becomes a villain with a split personality.
